sources.title: OGC API Features - Part 1 - Core corrigendum

name: descriptionType schema
annotatedSchema:
properties:
  additionalParameters:
    allOf:
    - $ref: https://ogcincubator.github.io/bblocks-ogcapi-processes/build/annotated/api/processes/v1/schemas/metadata/schema.yaml
    - properties:
        parameters:
          items:
            $ref: https://ogcincubator.github.io/bblocks-ogcapi-processes/build/annotated/api/processes/v1/schemas/additionalParameter/schema.yaml
          type: array
      type: object
  description:
    type: string
  keywords:
    items:
      type: string
    type: array
  metadata:
    items:
      $ref: https://ogcincubator.github.io/bblocks-ogcapi-processes/build/annotated/api/processes/v1/schemas/metadata/schema.yaml
    type: array
  title:
    type: string
type: object
